Parking_Notes: Zero spaces if ADU is less than 1000 square feet or within one half mile of a major transit stop; otherwise one space per ADU; up to 300 square feet of ADU parking or storage does not count toward ADU floor area
Owner_Occupancy_Notes: Owner occupancy is not required by LUC 20.20.120
Entry_Orientation_Notes: Attached ADU must follow primary building standards; DADU must follow middle housing and detached accessory standards in LUC 20.20.538 and 20.20.125
Reference_Code_Section: See LUC 20.20.128 for optional mixed income or affordable housing provisions
Two_Side_Yards_Min_ft: Standards may be modified by critical area or conservation subdivision regulations
ADU_Site_Limit_Notes: Existing accessory structures and guest cottages may be converted to ADUs; some conversions may exceed 1200 square feet when allowed by LUC 20.20.120
DADU_Setback_Notes: No more than two ADUs are allowed on a lot that permits a single family dwelling; no new ADU is allowed on a unit lot that already used ADU provisions
Critical_Area_Notes: DADUs must follow middle housing dimensional standards; a DADU may be located on a lot line that abuts an alley
Greenscape_Notes: Setbacks; density; and impervious limits may be modified by Critical Areas Overlay regulations in LUC 20.25H Front yard greenscape must meet or exceed fifty percent; existing nonconforming greenscape cannot be further reduced

Zone_Type: Professional Office with one dwelling unit allowed
Parking_Notes: Zero spaces if ADU is less than 1000 square feet or within one half mile of a major transit stop; otherwise one space per ADU; up to 300 square feet of ADU parking or storage does not count toward ADU floor area
Owner_Occupancy_Notes: Owner occupancy is not required by LUC 20.20.120
Entry_Orientation_Notes: Residential uses in PO must meet detached accessory and residential building standards as well as PO district standards
Reference_Code_Section: See LUC 20.20.128 for optional mixed income or affordable housing provisions
Two_Side_Yards_Min_ft: PO is primarily an office district; one dwelling unit is allowed and may have up to two ADUs when standards are met
ADU_Site_Limit_Notes: Existing accessory structures and guest cottages may be converted to ADUs under LUC 20.20.120
DADU_Setback_Notes: No more than two ADUs are allowed on a lot that contains a dwelling unit; no new ADU is allowed on a unit lot that already used ADU provisions
Critical_Area_Notes: DADUs must follow detached accessory and middle housing dimensional standards; other PO district setbacks continue to apply
Greenscape_Notes: Setbacks and intensity may be modified by Critical Areas Overlay regulations in LUC 20.25H Greenscape standards for PO are set by general landscaping requirements in LUC 20.20.520
